div.bibl: Chicago Greek Daily, May 8, 1928. ATLAS GROCERY COMPANY G. Koutsopanagos, N. Tsoulos, G. Tsoulos Importers of Greek and Italian Products, 718 South Halsted Street.

body.p: We have just received 250 barrels of white Greek cheese. We also have salted and sweet cheeses, Spanish and Italian olive oil, olive oil of our own brand, and tender milk-fed lambs.
